remediation: Avoid using all malicious instances of the @authentication-pages/vue-cli-prebuild package.
title: Malicious Package

vulnDescription.Overview: @authentication-pages/vue-cli-prebuild is a malicious package. This package contains malicious code, and its content was removed from the official package manager. While this package might be attempting to impersonate a valid organization, there is no connection between that organization and this package authorship.
